name: Cookies - Retro Style Puzzle
description:
A chief want you to help him to pop all the cookies as much as you can. Dont let him rip off. Help him to pop all the cookies!!! The more you eliminate the cookies the more you will level up.

100% Retro game with stunning retro sid game music
Cookies is your time travel ticket back to the late 70´s and the 80´s

You need to match the cookie colors and remove them as new cookies falls down,
The game play is close to the classic tetris but this one is faster and tons of more fun!
This is a type of jig puzzle and matching puzzle game.

It sure looks easy right? Well is it really?

This game requires a fast mind and quick reflexes.

Cookies is designed to help children develop their motor skills in the most fun way possible.

You can also check out our other games for tons of fun play!


How to play:

*Tap one or more adjacent cookies to destroy them, earn points and level up.
